sales.title: AI Voice Agent: Automated Phone Calls That Sound Human
sales.shortDescription: Your best sales rep never sleeps, never takes a break, and handles hundreds of calls simultaneously. Ultra-realistic AI voice agents powered by ElevenLabs.
sales.longDescription:
Imagine having a phone team that sounds completely natural, remembers every detail about each customer, and can make or receive thousands of calls a day—without ever getting tired or inconsistent.

What You Get

  • Ultra-realistic voice agents powered by ElevenLabs that your customers won't realize are AI
  • Multi-purpose automation for sales calls, debt collection, customer service, appointment scheduling, follow-ups, and more
  • Conversational intelligence that adapts to customer responses, handles objections, and knows when to escalate to a human
  • Seamless integration with your CRM, calendar, and existing systems for automatic data syncing

Perfect For

  • Sales teams drowning in follow-up calls and qualification conversations
  • Collection agencies needing consistent, compliant outreach at scale
  • Service businesses tired of playing phone tag for appointment scheduling
  • Support teams handling repetitive customer inquiries that don't need human intervention

We've built voice agents for debt collection portfolios, sales outreach campaigns, customer support systems, and appointment booking—our specialty is making AI that doesn't sound like AI. From the first 'hello' to closing the conversation, your customers get a helpful, natural experience.

Human-sounding. Always available. Infinitely scalable.

sales.title: Instant Quote Generator: From Inquiry to Proposal in Seconds
sales.shortDescription: Stop losing deals while your competitors respond faster. Generate professional quotes instantly from any channel—before prospects finish their coffee.
sales.longDescription:
You know the drill: a potential customer asks for a quote, you scramble through spreadsheets, calculate pricing, format a proposal, and by the time you hit send—they've already gone with someone else. What if quotes generated themselves the instant a request comes in?

What You Get

  • Immediate quote generation from website forms, emails, WhatsApp messages, or chatbot conversations
  • Dynamic pricing calculations that factor in product specs, quantity, customization, delivery, and discounts automatically
  • Professional branded proposals delivered instantly via email or downloadable PDF
  • Smart follow-ups that remind prospects and track which quotes are getting opened and reviewed

Perfect For

  • Service businesses juggling multiple quote requests and losing deals to slow response times
  • Product companies with complex pricing based on configurations, volume, or custom requirements
  • Contractors and agencies tired of spending hours on quotes that never close
  • Anyone who knows speed matters when customers are comparing options

No more 'let me get back to you tomorrow.' No more copy-pasting into proposal templates. From the moment someone asks 'how much?'—they get a detailed, accurate, professional quote before they finish their coffee.

Instant. Accurate. Professional. That's how you win deals.

sales.title: AI Lead Qualification System
sales.shortDescription: Stop wasting time on leads that will never buy. Let AI find the ones ready to close and route them to your best closers.
sales.longDescription:
Your sales team is burning hours chasing tire-kickers while real opportunities slip through the cracks. What if AI could instantly identify which leads are worth your time, score them by readiness to buy, and route hot prospects directly to your best closers?

What You Get

  • Intelligent lead scoring based on behavior, engagement, company fit, and buying signals—not just basic demographics
  • Automated qualification conversations via chatbot, email, or SMS that ask the right questions and assess intent
  • Priority routing that sends hot leads to sales immediately while nurturing cold ones until they're ready
  • Real-time insights on which lead sources actually convert and which are wasting your budget

Perfect For

  • Sales teams drowning in unqualified leads from marketing campaigns
  • B2B companies needing to identify decision-makers and budget holders fast
  • Service businesses that can't afford to chase every inquiry manually
  • Anyone tired of 'just browsing' conversations that go nowhere

No more guessing who's serious. No more equal treatment for window shoppers and ready buyers. AI analyzes every lead the moment they enter your funnel, separates gold from gravel, and makes sure your team only talks to people who are actually ready to do business.

Smarter pipeline. Better conversions. Zero time wasted.

marketing.title: Automatic Content Creation and Publishing
marketing.shortDescription: Imagine waking up to fresh content already published across all your platforms. No more blank screens, no more scrambling for ideas—just consistent, hands-free content.
marketing.longDescription:
What You Get

  • AI-powered content generation that matches your brand voice and speaks directly to your audience
  • Multi-platform publishing that automatically adapts your content for LinkedIn, Instagram, Twitter, blogs, and newsletters
  • Smart scheduling that posts when your audience is most active—no manual intervention needed
  • Consistent quality and frequency that keeps your brand top-of-mind without the burnout

Perfect For

  • Entrepreneurs who know content matters but don't have time to create it daily
  • Marketing teams stretched thin across multiple channels
  • Service providers who need to stay visible but prefer focusing on client work
  • Anyone tired of the content creation treadmill

From blog posts and social media updates to newsletters and video scripts—all created, optimized, and published automatically. You focus on running your business; we'll make sure your audience never forgets you exist.

Fast. Hands-free. Consistent. Just like you wanted it.

marketing.title: Lead Generation with SEO
marketing.shortDescription: Stop chasing clients. Make them find you instead. Strategic SEO that works 24/7 to fill your pipeline with high-intent leads.
marketing.longDescription:
What if your ideal customers were actively searching for exactly what you offer—and your business was the first thing they found? That's the power of strategic SEO working 24/7 to fill your pipeline.

What You Get

  • High-intent traffic from people already looking for your solution—not cold prospects you have to convince
  • Optimized content strategy that answers the exact questions your customers are asking Google
  • Local and industry-specific targeting that puts you in front of the right audience at the right time
  • Sustainable lead flow that grows month after month without increasing ad spend

Perfect For

  • Service businesses tired of expensive ads that stop working the moment you stop paying
  • B2B companies looking to establish authority and attract decision-makers organically
  • Local businesses wanting to dominate their geographic market
  • Anyone who'd rather invest in long-term growth than rent temporary visibility

No more cold outreach. No more praying the algorithm shows your posts. Just qualified leads discovering you because you're exactly what they were looking for.

Visible. Credible. Profitable. That's what good SEO does.

marketing.title: Lead Generation With Scraping
marketing.shortDescription: Build your dream client list while you sleep. Automation delivers thousands of perfectly-targeted prospects straight to your CRM.
marketing.longDescription:
Why spend hours manually hunting for leads when automation can deliver thousands of perfectly-targeted prospects straight to your CRM? Find the exact people who need what you sell—complete with contact info and key details.

What You Get

  • Precision-targeted prospect lists pulled from Google Maps, Google Search, LinkedIn, directories, marketplaces, and industry databases
  • Enriched contact data including emails, phone numbers, company size, job titles, and decision-maker info
  • Real-time updates that keep your lists fresh and relevant as new opportunities emerge
  • Custom filtering that matches your exact ideal customer profile—no wasted outreach

Perfect For

  • Sales teams who need a constant flow of qualified prospects without the manual research
  • B2B companies targeting specific industries, company sizes, or geographic regions
  • Agencies looking to fill their pipeline with businesses that match their niche
  • Anyone tired of buying outdated lead lists that go nowhere

No more endless scrolling through profiles. No more copying and pasting into spreadsheets. Just a continuously updated database of people actually worth reaching out to.

Targeted. Automated. Ready to convert.

customer-service.title: AI Email Analyzer and Auto-Responder
customer-service.shortDescription: Never manually sort through your inbox again. Let AI read, understand, and act on every email automatically—responding, updating databases, and routing issues.
customer-service.longDescription:
Your inbox is full of repetitive requests, data that needs logging, and questions with predictable answers. What if AI could handle all of it—responding to customers, updating your systems, and routing complex issues to the right person?

What You Get

  • Intelligent email classification that understands intent and categorizes messages automatically
  • Auto-responses for common inquiries that sound personalized and helpful, not robotic
  • Direct database updates from email content—customer info, support tickets, order details, all synced instantly
  • Smart routing that escalates complex or sensitive emails to the right team member

Perfect For

  • Customer service teams buried under repetitive questions and status requests
  • Sales operations needing to log prospect interactions and update CRM records automatically
  • Operations managers tracking requests, approvals, or updates scattered across email threads
  • Anyone tired of emails being a black hole where information goes to die

Stop letting valuable data sit trapped in your inbox. Stop manually copying information between emails and spreadsheets. Let AI read every message, extract what matters, and take action—whether that's replying to the customer or updating your database in real-time.

Real Case Study

In this example, we built an automation for a kindergarten where AI reads incoming emails, understands payment receipts from parents, and automatically updates the database to track which parents have paid and which haven't—completely hands-free.

Automated. Accurate. Always up to date.

customer-service.title: Automated Sales Assistant ChatBot
customer-service.shortDescription: Your website's new closer. Always online, always helpful, always converting visitors into customers—24/7, in multiple languages.
customer-service.longDescription:
Your website's new closer. Always online, always helpful, always converting visitors into customers.

Most visitors leave your website with questions unanswered. What if you had a sales assistant who engages every single visitor instantly, answers their questions perfectly, and guides them straight to purchase—24/7, in multiple languages, without ever taking a coffee break?

What You Get

  • Instant engagement that captures visitors the moment they land on your site, before they bounce
  • Smart product recommendations based on customer needs, budget, and preferences
  • Seamless handoff to human sales when deals need a personal touch, with full conversation context
  • Multi-channel presence across your website, WhatsApp, Instagram, and Facebook Messenger

Perfect For

  • E-commerce stores losing sales to unanswered questions and abandoned carts
  • Service businesses that can't afford to miss leads outside business hours
  • B2B companies with complex products that need educated guidance
  • Anyone tired of watching traffic numbers that don't translate to revenue

From answering product questions and comparing options to collecting contact info and scheduling demos—your chatbot handles the entire pre-sale conversation. It knows your products, understands objections, and never lets a hot lead go cold.

Real Case Study

In this example, we implemented a chatbot widget on a website to help users navigate, answer questions instantly, and guide them to the right products and services—improving engagement and reducing bounce rates.

Always on. Always helpful. Always closing.

operations.title: AI Company Brain
operations.shortDescription: What if your entire business knowledge lived in one intelligent system that every team member could ask anything, anytime?
operations.longDescription:
What if your entire business knowledge lived in one intelligent system that every team member could ask anything, anytime?

Your company's expertise is scattered across Slack threads, Google Docs, employee memories, and tribal knowledge that walks out the door when someone quits. What if all of it—processes, client history, product specs, past decisions—lived in one AI system that answers questions, trains new hires, and ensures nobody ever says 'I don't know' again?

What You Get

  • Centralized knowledge repository that learns from your documents, conversations, databases, and team interactions
  • Instant answers to any business question—from 'how do we handle refunds?' to 'what did we promise this client last quarter?'
  • Automated onboarding that brings new team members up to speed without pulling veterans away from their work
  • Continuous learning that captures institutional knowledge as your company grows and evolves

Perfect For

  • Growing companies losing efficiency as information becomes harder to find
  • Teams tired of answering the same questions over and over
  • Businesses where critical knowledge exists only in a few people's heads
  • Anyone who's ever lost a deal or made a mistake because 'nobody knew that'

From SOPs and client preferences to vendor contacts and project history—your AI Company Brain remembers everything, connects the dots, and makes your entire organization smarter. It's like having your most experienced employee available 24/7, except this one never forgets, never leaves, and scales infinitely.

One source of truth. Infinite accessibility. Zero knowledge loss.

operations.title: Automated Data Entry & Document Processing
operations.shortDescription: Stop typing. Start trusting AI to read, extract, and organize your data perfectly—every single time.
operations.longDescription:
Stop typing. Start trusting AI to read, extract, and organize your data perfectly—every single time.

Your team is burning hours copying information from invoices, forms, contracts, and receipts into spreadsheets. Every manual entry is a chance for error, delay, and frustration. What if AI could read any document, pull exactly what you need, and populate your systems automatically?

What You Get

  • Intelligent document recognition that extracts data from invoices, purchase orders, forms, contracts, receipts, and IDs
  • Multi-format processing for PDFs, scanned images, emails, and even handwritten documents
  • Automatic data validation that catches errors and flags inconsistencies before they hit your database
  • Seamless integration with your accounting software, CRM, inventory systems, or custom databases

Perfect For

  • Accounting teams drowning in invoice processing and expense reports
  • Operations managers tired of chasing down missing form fields and incorrect entries
  • HR departments manually entering employee information and onboarding documents
  • Anyone who knows their team's time is worth more than data entry work

No more squinting at receipts. No more 'oops, I put that in the wrong column.' Just upload or forward your documents—AI reads them, understands the context, extracts what matters, and updates your systems instantly. From hundreds of invoices to thousands of forms, processed in minutes instead of days.

Accurate. Instant. Effortless.

management.title: Automated Project Management System
management.shortDescription: Transform chaotic project management into streamlined operations where nothing falls through the cracks.
management.longDescription:
Transform chaotic project management into streamlined operations where nothing falls through the cracks.

Every project starts the same way: someone creates tasks manually, assigns them, hopes people remember deadlines, and scrambles to track what's actually getting done. What if your entire project pipeline built itself—complete with tasks, assignments, reminders, and progress tracking—the moment a new project kicks off?

What You Get

  • Auto-generated project pipelines that create complete workflows based on project type, with zero manual setup
  • Smart task checklists customized to each project's needs, automatically assigned to the right team members
  • Progress automation that moves projects through stages as tasks complete—no manual status updates needed
  • Real-time management dashboards showing exactly where every project stands, what's blocked, and who's behind
  • Full integration with Slack, email, and calendars to keep everyone aligned without constant meetings

Perfect For

  • Growing teams where projects are starting to slip through the cracks
  • Managers tired of chasing updates and wondering what's actually happening
  • Operations leaders who need visibility without micromanaging
  • Anyone exhausted by the administrative overhead of just keeping projects organized

From client onboarding and product launches to construction jobs and marketing campaigns—your system knows exactly what needs to happen, who should do it, and when. Team members always know their next task. Managers see everything at a glance. Nothing gets forgotten.

Organized. Automated. Always on track.

management.title: Automated Reporting Dashboard
management.shortDescription: Stop building reports. Start making decisions based on data that updates itself—real-time insights from all your systems in one place.
management.longDescription:
Stop building reports. Start making decisions based on data that updates itself.

Your team wastes hours every week pulling numbers from different systems, copying them into spreadsheets, formatting charts, and emailing reports that are already outdated by the time they're read. What if every metric you care about lived in one dashboard that refreshes automatically and tells you exactly what's working and what's not?

What You Get

  • Real-time data visualization that pulls from all your systems—CRM, accounting, project management, analytics, and more
  • Custom KPI tracking for sales performance, team productivity, customer metrics, financial health, whatever matters to your business
  • Automated alerts when numbers hit thresholds—so you catch problems before they become disasters
  • Role-based views where executives see the big picture while team leads drill into their specific metrics

Perfect For

  • Leadership teams tired of asking 'how are we doing?' and waiting days for answers
  • Department heads juggling data across multiple platforms with no unified view
  • Growing businesses where manual reporting can't keep up with the pace
  • Anyone making critical decisions based on gut feel because getting accurate data is too slow

No more end-of-month scrambles to compile reports. No more 'let me pull those numbers and get back to you.' Just open your dashboard and instantly see sales trends, project status, team capacity, customer health, financial performance—whatever drives your business. Data that's always fresh, always accurate, always accessible.

Real Example

A/B testing dashboard for call campaigns—tracking success rates and performance metrics across different call scripts.

Instant insights. Better decisions. Zero manual work.

management.title: AI-Powered Task Automation
management.shortDescription: The repetitive work that eats your day? AI can do it in seconds. Custom automation workflows tailored to your exact business processes.
management.longDescription:
The repetitive work that eats your day? AI can do it in seconds.

You didn't start your business to spend hours on data entry, status updates, file organization, email sorting, and copy-pasting between systems. What if all those soul-crushing repetitive tasks just... happened automatically, while you focused on work that actually moves the needle?

What You Get

  • Custom automation workflows tailored to your exact business processes—not generic templates
  • Cross-platform integration that connects your CRM, email, calendar, databases, spreadsheets, and communication tools
  • Intelligent decision-making where AI handles conditional logic, data extraction, and context-aware actions
  • Scalable execution that handles one task or ten thousand with the same reliability

Perfect For

  • Entrepreneurs drowning in administrative work that doesn't grow the business
  • Operations teams manually moving data between systems all day
  • Customer service handling repetitive requests that follow predictable patterns
  • Anyone who's ever thought 'there has to be a better way to do this'

From updating CRM records when emails arrive to generating reports when projects close, from organizing files by content to routing support tickets based on urgency—AI handles it all. You set the rules once, and automation runs forever. No more 'I'll get to it later.' No more human error. Just tasks completing themselves in the background.

Effortless. Reliable. Infinitely scalable.
